name: Lunar Catastrophe
summary: Lunar Catastrophe is a classic-themed megawad for Doom released on December 30, 2018. A joint-effort by partners Samantha McNallen (Miss Bubbles) & Derek Pierson (Count651), the four episode megawad is heavily inspired by Doom's abstract level design, taking inspiration not only from John Romero but Sandy Petersen and Tom Hall as well. It took two years to make, with both creators splitting the workload evenly. It was a runner-up in the Cacowards 2019.
